analysis.Summary: Vue SFC that renders an SVG-based "earn" icon with customizable fill color.
analysis.Purpose: Provide a reusable, theme-able icon component for the "earn" symbol in the UI.

Components.name: IconEarn
Components.responsibility: Encapsulates an SVG graphic and exposes a `fill` prop to control the icon color.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.description: Vue Composition API helper used in `<script setup>` to declare component props.

fill.description: CSS color string applied to all `<path>` elements in the SVG.

Dependencies: Global CSS variables (e.g. `--black` for default fill)
analysis.Usage: Import and register (or auto-register) in a Vue parent component, then use `<IconEarn fill="#FF0000" />` to render the icon with a custom color.
Notes: No `<style>` blockâ€”styling is entirely via the `fill` prop and inherited SVG attributes.
Implemented using the `<script setup>` syntax for brevity and better tree-shaking.
Default fill uses a CSS variable to integrate with the project's design system.
Purely presentational; contains no reactive state or lifecycle hooks.
